title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Sergio Mora might be having a change of heart
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Sergio Mora might be having a change of heart
description:
Chris is joined by his DAZN broadcast partner, Sergio Mora to talk about if he is starting to change his feelings about Jake Paul, and they discuss the biggest stories from the week. later in the show, Keith Thurman stops by to talk about why he hasn't fought in a while and what we can expect from him as he gets back in the ring. Finally, Chris is 5-1 when it comes to his boxing picks, he puts that record on the line with his picks for this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
